sent.orig: We have Chinese restaurant and a western-style restaurant. Which one do you prefer?
sent.trans: 我们有中餐厅和西餐厅，您愿意去哪一个？

sent.orig: Chinese restaurant in Chaozhou, Guangdong-based, and another restaurant to choose from.
sent.trans: 中餐厅以潮州菜、粤菜为主，另有西餐厅可供选择。

sent.orig: Restaurant mentioned the Museum Restaurant head Wang, many people will be eaten outflow to drool.
sent.trans: 提到湘菜馆的湘菜鱼头王，不少吃过的人都会流出口水来。

sent.orig: He bought the restaurant and used the brother' family name for his new restaurant.
sent.trans: 他买下了这个餐厅。就把这对兄弟的姓拿来做他新餐厅的招牌。

sent.orig: But unfortunately the restaurant winduped the seafood restaurant business and turned into sundry shop.
sent.trans: 可惜的是几年前改变营业方式，把餐馆生意改型为杂货店。
